Desc.entry: Supported accommodation provided by Melrose Hostel Ltd for people with learning disabilities aged 18 years and over. 24hr staff. Service users receive individual support plans which include: managing personal safety, motivation and encouragement, meaningful activity and use of time, life skills, money matters and personal administration, health, community networks, cultural and social integration, mental well-being, offending behaviour, use of alcohol and drugs, living in your home and getting a home, move on aspirations. Also provides advice and help in seeking job/training and education, advocacy and a befriending service. There is a charge for this service. 9 units in service. Self or any referral.
